billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Prohibits the unauthorized change of a natural gas or electric service provider
summary: Prohibits suppliers of natural gas or electric service from changing a customer's supplier of gas or electric service (commonly known as "slamming") unless such supplier complies with requirement established by the public service commission; authorizes the commission to establish requirements for customer consent; makes enforcement provisions to punish violators of slamming requirements.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to unauthorized changes in suppliers of natural gas and electric service
